rows.label: qst201706_msg0001
rows.name: Excuse me, sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0002
rows.name:
The subjugation of the Ship-Eating
Taos attached to the Divine Beast
Warship has been completed!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0003
rows.name:
...You have returned
safely. Good work, Newt.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0004
rows.name: Sir! Thank you, sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0005
rows.name:
However, such independent
action as this is never
permissible for a soldier.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0006
rows.name:
Strive to ensure that such an
incident never occurs again.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0007
rows.name: Sir! Understood, sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0008
rows.name:
Grand Marshal, thank you
for your lenient measures.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0009
rows.name:
Not at all. It is a fact that
we could not have defeated the
Ship-Eating Taos without her.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0010
rows.name: It is I who should be thanking you.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0011
rows.name:
Meleph-dono, in the past, there
were many soldiers like her.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0012
rows.name:
True, there were many problems,
but they were also very reliable.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0013
rows.name:
The army has become a
lonely place now...

rows.label: qst201706_msg0014
rows.name: I agree with you...

rows.label: qst201706_msg0015
rows.name:
Ah, Newt. Would you
do me another favor?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0016
rows.name: Sir! What is it, sir?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0017
rows.name:
I must go and report this incident
to His Majesty the Emperor.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0018
rows.name:
As you were involved, I
would like you to accompany
me... What do you say?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0019
rows.name: R-Really, sir?!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0020
rows.name:
But... is it truly acceptable
for someone like me to
meet His Majesty...?

rows.label: qst201706_msg0021
rows.name:
It is the Grand Marshal's goodwill.
You should accept it graciously.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0022
rows.name: Thank you, sir!

rows.label: qst201706_msg0023
rows.name: I have a slight feeling of unease...

rows.label: qst201706_msg0024
rows.name:
Newt loves the Superbian
army so much, she might burst
into tears from emotion.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0025
rows.name:
No, this is a good opportunity
to teach Newt the etiquette
and conduct of a soldier.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0026
rows.name: It seems Meleph-dono has no objections.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0027
rows.name:
Then, Newt, I hereby order you
to report on the subjugation
of the Ship-Eating Taos.

rows.label: qst201706_msg0028
rows.name:
Sir! I, Newt, will now undertake
the duty of reporting, sir!
